title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to ESPN's Louis Riddick about the Dolphins punishment. Which is worse, tanking or cheating to win? Legendary broadcaster Al Michaels calls in to reflect on the life of Vin Scully. Dan Le Batard and his crew offer a challenge to DP and the Danettes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
